splash.manifesto: CutMatch is a mirror into how people feel, express, and grow.

upload.title: Discover Your Perfect Style
upload.subtitle: Take or upload a photo to get personalized hairstyle recommendations
upload.cameraPermissionMessage: We need camera access to take photos for style analysis.
upload.galleryPermissionMessage: We need gallery access to select photos for style analysis.
upload.noImageMessage: Please take or select a photo to continue.
upload.tip1: Face the camera directly with good lighting
upload.tip2: Keep hair visible and away from face
upload.tip3: Use a neutral background if possible

analyzing.title: Analyzing Your Style
analyzing.subtitle: Our AI is analyzing your photo to find the perfect hairstyles for you

suggestions.title: Your Style Suggestions
suggestions.subtitle: Based on your {{faceShape}} face shape ({{confidence}}% confidence)
suggestions.noResults: No styles match your current filters. Try adjusting them!

favorites.title: Your Favorites
favorites.subtitle: {{count}} saved styles
favorites.removeMessage: Are you sure you want to remove this style from favorites?
favorites.clearAllMessage: This will remove all saved styles. This action cannot be undone.
favorites.shareMessage: Check out my favorite hairstyles from CutMatch!
favorites.emptyMessage: Start exploring styles and save your favorites to see them here.
favorites.tip1: Save styles you love to compare them later
favorites.tip2: Add notes to remember styling instructions
favorites.tip3: Share your collection with your stylist

profile.title: Your Profile
profile.subtitle: Help us personalize your style recommendations
profile.affirmationsDescription: Receive positive affirmations based on your mood
profile.resetMessage: This will reset all your preferences to default values.
profile.saveSuccessMessage: Your preferences have been updated successfully.
profile.saveErrorMessage: There was an error saving your profile. Please try again.
profile.infoText: Your profile helps us provide more accurate and culturally appropriate style recommendations. All data is stored locally on your device.

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Customize your CutMatch experience
settings.analyticsDesc: Help improve the app with usage data
settings.highQualityDesc: Use higher resolution images (uses more data)
settings.clearDataDesc: Remove all app data from this device
settings.clearDataMessage: This will permanently delete all your favorites, notes, and settings. This action cannot be undone.
settings.dataClearedMessage: All app data has been removed from this device.
settings.exportErrorMessage: There was an error exporting your data.
settings.rateAppDesc: Leave a review in the app store
settings.rateAppMessage: Thank you for using CutMatch! Please rate us in the app store.

styleDetail.noNote: Tap edit to add a personal note
styleDetail.noteSavedMessage: Your note has been saved successfully.
styleDetail.productsSubtitle: Products that work well with this style
styleDetail.shareMessage: Check out this {{styleName}} hairstyle I found on CutMatch: {{link}}
styleDetail.printGeneratedMessage: Your style reference has been prepared for printing.
styleDetail.printErrorMessage: There was an error generating the print version.
